attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
St Richards Hospital (SRH) serves a large geographical area with an increasing population with additional housing plus a large influx of holidaymakers.
Long journeys put lives at risk, ambulance have to stop for may have to stop for treatment to be carried out!
SRH has an excellent reputation many travelling  from outside the catchment area.
Please save such a valuable asset- once downgraded it will never recover and lives may be lost! Could lead to more litigation!
